[The Contract]
Genesis BBQ President Yoon Honggeun
Nego King Hwang Kwanghee

2. We'll give out 2 cheese balls for free when it is delivered regarding the discount with Nego King.
3. When the BBQ episode of Nego King reaches 5 million views, Hwang Kwanghee will be the model for BBQ.
4. We will release Maple Butter Garlic Chicken within August.
